about_golfin_game.header_p_text:
Experience real golf, anywhere.
Step into a world of authentic golf with stunningly
realistic courses and true-to-life game play.

box_one.heading: CHARACTERS
box_one.subtext_p: From an initial selection of 4 a growing number of characters from all over the world can be acquired and leveled-up to suit any playstyle.
box_one.subtext_p_subheading: The rarer the character, the more powerful they are!

box_two.heading: ITEMS
box_two.subtext_p: Every club handles differently, pick the right one for precision or power.
box_two.subtext_p_subheading: Balls offer extra benefits, but can be lost!

box_three.heading: COURSES
box_three.subtext_p: Starting with the beautiful Yaita Country Club, our courses are based on real life, recreated in full 3D.
box_three.subtext_p_subheading: Learn its ways and use golf knowledge to win.

level_up_your_game.heading:
LEVEL UP
YOUR GAME
level_up_your_game.subtext: Earn reward points through playing, and unlock your true potential by leveling up your characters and gear.

meta.title: GOLFIN - CRYPTO x AI GOLF TOURNAMENT | TOKEN2049 Event
meta.description: Join the revolutionary CRYPTO x AI Golf Tournament at TOKEN2049. Experience the future of Web3 networking with $200K USDC prize pool. September 30, 2025 at Sentosa Golf Club, Singapore.
meta.keywords: crypto, AI, golf tournament, TOKEN2049, Web3, blockchain, Singapore, Sentosa, USDC, prize pool
